title: Web project of which everyone can take part
text: Created in the summer of 2018 with the idea of ​​using vector animation right on the site and making it accessible to all by the editor
If you are interested in drawing, developing, go to the [support page], at the moment there is [not enough time and effort to develop one]
The site uses [Coffeescript] for writing interactive on the editor page
[Vue.js] framework is used to manipulate elements and [Vuetify] for UI

title: In future plans
text: • Using the [webcamera] to capture movements to control the "avatar"
